ENTRY.SYNOPSIS: Utility routines for Sherpa (CIAO contributed package).

DESC.PARA: The sherpa_contrib.utils module provides utility routines for Sherpa users, and is provided as part of the CIAO contributed scripts package.
The module can be loaded into Sherpa by saying either of:
DESC.VERBATIM: from sherpa_contrib.utils import * from sherpa_contrib.all import *
DESC.PARA: where the second form loads in all the Sherpa contributed routines, not just the utils module.
The utils module currenly provides the routines:

ROW.DATA: Change the normalization of a model to match the data.
Write out the model spectrum in the form required by mkinstmap
Plot up the model spectrum in the form required by mkinstmap
return the model spectrum in the form required by mkinstmap
Return the estimated exposure map value by weighting the ARF by the spectral model

DESC.PARA: See the ahelp file for the routine and the contributed scripts page for further information.

ADESC.title: Changes in the scripts 4.11.4 (2019) release
ADESC.PARA: The plot_instmap_weights() routine now uses the Sherpa plot backend (controlled by the plot_pkg setting in a user's ~/.sherpa.rc file), rather than always using ChIPS.

ADESC.title: Changes in the scripts 4.8.2 (January 2016) release
ADESC.PARA: The estimate_weighted_expmap() routine has been updated to work in CIAO 4.8.

ADESC.title: Changes in the October 2012 release
ADESC.PARA: The file created by this command now includes some basic metadata for use with fluximage, flux_obs, and merge_obs.
